Html:
Hey, the feature to take a gif video is amazing but I've noticed that there is no possibility to take a no-animed (or static) screenshot (like png, jpg, bmp, static gif...)

At this time, I've to use VTI to take static screenshots and I'm mad, 'cause wabbitemu is incredibly better.

 

See you and thanks for this great emulators and these softwares (wabbitcode, SPASM2...)
Oups, never mind, just now, I launched an old version of wabbitemu !
I'll also mention that you can take a static screenshot just by dragging the screen off Wabbit.
